item.title: Docs: NamespacedIngress v1alpha1 API Reference
item.description:
Packages:

  • flomesh.io/v1alpha1

flomesh.io/v1alpha1

Package v1alpha1 is the v1alpha1 version of the API.

Resource Types:
  • NamespacedIngress

NamespacedIngress

NamespacedIngress is the Schema for the NamespacedIngresss API

Field Description
apiVersion
string		 flomesh.io/v1alpha1
kind
string 		NamespacedIngress
metadata
Kubernetes meta/v1.ObjectMeta 		Refer to the Kubernetes API documentation for the fields of the metadata field.
spec
NamespacedIngressSpec

serviceType
Kubernetes core/v1.ServiceType

ServiceType determines how the Ingress is exposed. For an Ingress the most used types are NodePort, and LoadBalancer
serviceAnnotations
map[string]string 		(Optional)

ServiceAnnotations, those annotations are applied to Ingress Service
serviceLabels
map[string]string 		(Optional)

ServiceLabels, those annotations are applied to Ingress Service
podAnnotations
map[string]string 		(Optional)

PodAnnotations, those annotations are applied to Ingress POD
podLabels
map[string]string 		(Optional)

PodAnnotations, those labels are applied to Ingress POD
http
HTTP 		(Optional)

The http configuration of this ingress controller.
tls
TLS 		(Optional)

TLS is the configuration of TLS of this ingress controller
env
[]Kubernetes core/v1.EnvVar 		(Optional)

List of environment variables to set in the ingress container. Cannot be updated.
resources
Kubernetes core/v1.ResourceRequirements 		(Optional)

Compute Resources required by Ingress container. Cannot be updated.
nodeSelector
map[string]string 		(Optional)

NodeSelector is a selector which must be true for the pod to fit on a node. Selector which must match a node’s labels for the pod to be scheduled on that node.
serviceAccountName
string 		(Optional)

ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run this pod.
affinity
Kubernetes core/v1.Affinity 		(Optional)

If specified, the pod’s scheduling constraints
tolerations
[]Kubernetes core/v1.Toleration 		(Optional)

If specified, the pod’s tolerations.
logLevel
int 		(Optional)

LogLevel is the log level of this ingress controller pod.
replicas
int32 		(Optional)

Replicas, how many replicas of the ingress controller will be running for this namespace.
securityContext
Kubernetes core/v1.SecurityContext 		(Optional)

SecurityContext defines the security options the container should be run with. If set, the fields of SecurityContext override the equivalent fields of PodSecurityContext.
podSecurityContext
Kubernetes core/v1.PodSecurityContext 		(Optional)

PodSecurityContext holds pod-level security attributes and common container settings. Optional: Defaults to empty. See type description for default values of each field.
status
NamespacedIngressStatus

HTTP

(Appears on:NamespacedIngressSpec)

Field Description
enabled
bool 		(Optional)

Enabled, if HTTP is enabled for the Ingress Controller
port
Kubernetes core/v1.ServicePort

Port, The http port that are exposed by this ingress service.

NamespacedIngressSpec

(Appears on:NamespacedIngress)

NamespacedIngressSpec defines the desired state of NamespacedIngress

Field Description
serviceType
Kubernetes core/v1.ServiceType

ServiceType determines how the Ingress is exposed. For an Ingress the most used types are NodePort, and LoadBalancer
serviceAnnotations
map[string]string 		(Optional)

ServiceAnnotations, those annotations are applied to Ingress Service
serviceLabels
map[string]string 		(Optional)

ServiceLabels, those annotations are applied to Ingress Service
podAnnotations
map[string]string 		(Optional)

PodAnnotations, those annotations are applied to Ingress POD
podLabels
map[string]string 		(Optional)

PodAnnotations, those labels are applied to Ingress POD
http
HTTP 		(Optional)

The http configuration of this ingress controller.
tls
TLS 		(Optional)

TLS is the configuration of TLS of this ingress controller
env
[]Kubernetes core/v1.EnvVar 		(Optional)

List of environment variables to set in the ingress container. Cannot be updated.
resources
Kubernetes core/v1.ResourceRequirements 		(Optional)

Compute Resources required by Ingress container. Cannot be updated.
nodeSelector
map[string]string 		(Optional)

NodeSelector is a selector which must be true for the pod to fit on a node. Selector which must match a node’s labels for the pod to be scheduled on that node.
serviceAccountName
string 		(Optional)

ServiceAccountName is the name of the ServiceAccount to use to run this pod.
affinity
Kubernetes core/v1.Affinity 		(Optional)

If specified, the pod’s scheduling constraints
tolerations
[]Kubernetes core/v1.Toleration 		(Optional)

If specified, the pod’s tolerations.
logLevel
int 		(Optional)

LogLevel is the log level of this ingress controller pod.
replicas
int32 		(Optional)

Replicas, how many replicas of the ingress controller will be running for this namespace.
securityContext
Kubernetes core/v1.SecurityContext 		(Optional)

SecurityContext defines the security options the container should be run with. If set, the fields of SecurityContext override the equivalent fields of PodSecurityContext.
podSecurityContext
Kubernetes core/v1.PodSecurityContext 		(Optional)

PodSecurityContext holds pod-level security attributes and common container settings. Optional: Defaults to empty. See type description for default values of each field.

NamespacedIngressStatus

(Appears on:NamespacedIngress)

NamespacedIngressStatus defines the observed state of NamespacedIngress

Field Description
replicas
int32
selector
string

SSLPassthrough

(Appears on:TLS)

Field Description
enabled
bool 		(Optional)

Enabled, if SSL passthrough is enabled for the Ingress Controller It’s mutual exclusive with TLS offload/termination within the controller scope.
upstreamPort
int32 		(Optional)

UpstreamPort, is the port of upstream services.

TLS

(Appears on:NamespacedIngressSpec)

Field Description
enabled
bool 		(Optional)

Enabled, if TLS is enabled for the Ingress Controller
port
Kubernetes core/v1.ServicePort

Port, The https port that are exposed by this ingress service.
sslPassthrough
SSLPassthrough 		(Optional)

SSLPassthrough configuration
